title: Hey Riot, I was wondering out of curiosity what made you decide to go with Mittens for Yordle Item.
body: My first guess is to hide the fingers, if so was there any other reasoning behind it? Ty for any response {{sticker:sg-poppy}}

replies.body:
Honestly? Someone was having a forum convo with me about these item suggestions and one of them WAS Yordle. I'll see if I can find the convo.

I think this is legitimately caused by a TFT forum thread.

Here it is:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/teamfight-tactics/opXEfKMY-tft-needs-tenacity-everything-has-a-counter-except-for-stuns?comment=0007

#This thread literally spawned our new items.

Except of, instead of "boots" Riot used "gloves"

The dodge is there. 
The Yordle is there.
The concept of dodging CC is there.
